name: The Art Factory
description:
Made for PaintJam 2020

Welcome to your new job in the PaintCo Mega Mass Produced Art Plant. Work through 5 days of grueling minimum wage work, and experience the rush of the brush!

Use your mouse to fill in the boxes on the painting to match the template perfectly.

Controls:
     Mouse only

Challenges done

  • (Only use the default MS Paint color palette.) OK!
  • (Use only comic sans for any in-game font.) OK!
  • (Draw your assets without a drawing tablet.) OK!
  • (Try to make the title/logo without any real type/font.) OK!

Latest Version 1.2 submitted 5:52 EST 4/5/2020
